title: TiF4-mediated, one-pot, reductive amination of carboxylic acids with borane–ammonia
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31205-31209
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05888G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Madison J. Snyder, Abdulkhaliq A. Alawaed, Chunge Li, Samantha Pacentine, Henry J. Hamann, P. Veeraraghavan Ramachandran
Reductive alkylation of amines with carboxylic acids is achieved using BH3–NH3 and TiF4, yielding free amines or their borane-complexes.
